scripts.build:css: npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/input.css -o ./css/output.css && npx shx cp src/styles/components.css css/components.css
scripts.build: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.watch: npm run watch:css & npm run watch:js
scripts.build:minify: npx tailwindcss -i ./src/styles/input.css -o ./css/output.css --minify && npx shx cp src/styles/components.css css/components.css && webpack --mode production
